name: Manufactured Home Loan Insurance (Title I)
objective: To help people purchase a manufactured home or refinance an existing manufactured home loan. mortgage.
top_agency_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
sub_agency_name: Assistant Secretary for Housing -- Federal Housing Commissioner
assistance_types: Sale, Exchange, or Donation of Property or Goods

authorizations.text: National Housing Act, Title I, Section 2, as amended, 12 U.S.C. 1703.
